Desc.entry: Open to anyone who lives or works in the wider area around Banner Cross or anyone who has an affinity with it. Aims to provide information to both its members and the wider public about events within the Banner Cross area and to generate community involvement through social activities. Also seeks to enhance the physical environment of Banner Cross by working with residents, agencies and the city council to make the area a more pleasant place to live and to promote the economic and commercial life of the business community.

category.entry: COMMUNITY FORUMS AND LOCAL ACTION GROUPS
